items.summary: Fix the back button layout across the app so that on larger screens (before the hamburger menu kicks in), the back button sits visually below the header bar ('Logged In / Logout' or 'Exploring as Guest (Saved Locally) Return to Start') in the normal document flow. The fix must be layout/flow-based â€” not achieved via z-index. On smaller screens where the hamburger menu is active, the current correct behavior must be preserved.

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, apply `rounded-full` to the play/pause button so it renders as a perfect circle. Do not change its existing colors, background, hover effects, sizing, or any other styling.

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, remove vertical padding (py-*, pt-*, pb-*, padding-top, padding-bottom) from the parent wrapper containers that hold the volume control input and the time/seek control input, so that the inner input container's own padding is not doubled.

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, ensure the back button is always visible on all screen sizes. Remove any responsive hiding classes such as `hidden`, `sm:hidden`, `md:hidden`, `lg:hidden`, or any breakpoint-based display:none rules applied to it.
